Este juego es simplemente espectacular, te proporciona una historia muy buena y sobretodo una grandisima jugabilidad.

Es sin duda uno de los juegos mas divertidos que te puedes encontrar y ahora que esta de rebajas es un must buy, si aun no lo teneis claro.

[h1]Best co-op. Too long story. Amazing game nonetheless[/h1]

Okay, this is a sequel to [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/400/]Portal[/url] and while the Portal 2 story is a continuation of Portal story, you don't really need to have played Portal to get the hang of things in Portal 2. Just know that GLaDOS was the evil boss in the last game who made you go through test chambers 'cause she was a freak and you defeated her.
I do suggest you to play Portal first though. It was just as much a cool game too. It just didn't have co-op.

Now, GLaDOS is as cranky as ever with her idiosyncratic love of testing and odd demeaning sense of humor :P
But this time you get to work with her!
It may get a bit boring after a while since the story is pretty long! (around 15-20hrs of gameplay?)

I spent a lot more time playing co-op than the main story though. And boy! was it amazing! XD
I killed my partner hell lot of times and it was so fun XD And what was funnier was when GLaDOS would demean him for it XD
It was amazing trying to work out the puzzles together :')

Also the endings were totally mind-blowing! Both main story and co-op.
Esse jogo é divertidíssimo. O "computador" é hilário.

Вряд ли вы сможете сейчас найти игру со столь интересным и необычным геймплеем, с прекрасным юморком не скатывающимся в Петросянчество, отличной даже по сегодняшним меркам графикой ( котороя к тому же не требовательна к железу) и трогательной концовкой, которую при шестом прохождении и при вспоминании того, какая же все же отличная игра вышла ( и как жаль что она закончилась) трудно пережить без слез об прошедшей игре. Эта игра на века. Однозначно 10\10 и номинация от меня на премию «ПРОВЕРЕНО ВРЕМЕНЕМ». УРА, ТОВАРИЩИ!!!

Portal 2, now, where to start. Well, this game can be pretty explanitory. Similar to its predeccessor, you shoot portals to get to seemingly unreachable places. Unlike its predeccessor, they added new mechanics, increased the game length, added more music (good music even), and more plot twists! And that's not all, but multiplayer, community made maps, MODS for hell's sake! This game also shows some history on the series villian and makes her seem more emphetic, which is why I think this game should win the "Villian Who Needs A Hug" award. Anything else? Well, soundtrack is downloadable for free and sales + overall low price make this game easily accessible, so if you haven't picked this game up, do it! You'll thank me later.
